title: JAMAICA - Poster Girl - FONT ID
content:
Looking for the font used on this beautiful - ahem - t-shirt.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829012007im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sintra_6074.jpg)

| --- | --- |

author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Hard to say, nothing really distinctive, some kind of tight trackened ' [Helvetica Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829012007/http:/myfonts.us/td-u0L5jQ)' to me...
